attributes.action: introduce a genuinely progressive, transparent income tax regime not designed to punish saving for retirement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Two simple rules.  

1 An income tax regime should be progressive so that rates increase with pay.  

2 Tax should be paid when income is received (either before or after retirement).  

Please reverse the assaults on these rules in this year's Budget.
